reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 33/02: DESIGNATION OF COMMUNITY CARE ACCESS CORPORATIONS AS APPROVED AGENCIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION OF COMMUNITY CARE ACCESS CORPORATIONS AS APPROVED AGENCIES
reg_info.act_under: Community Care Access Corporations Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les sociétés d’accès aux soins communautaires

content.content: 2. (1) Every community care access corporation is deemed under subsection 3 (1) of the Act to be an approved agency under the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (1); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (1). (2) Each approved agency is approved to provide all of the professional services listed in subsection 2 (7) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (2); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (2). (3) Each approved agency is approved to provide all of the personal support services listed in subsection 2 (6) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (3); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (3). (4) Each approved agency is approved to provide the following homemaking services: 1. The services listed in paragraphs 1, 2, 5 to 10, 13 and 14 of subsection 2 (5) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. 2. The services listed in paragraphs 11 and 12 of subsection 2 (5) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994, but only in connection with the services listed in paragraphs 1, 2 and 5 to 10 of that subsection. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (4); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (4, 5).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Every community care access corporation is deemed under subsection 3 (1) of the Act to be an approved agency under the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (1); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (1).

(2) Each approved agency is approved to provide all of the professional services listed in subsection 2 (7) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (2); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (2).

(3) Each approved agency is approved to provide all of the personal support services listed in subsection 2 (6) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (3); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (3).

(4) Each approved agency is approved to provide the following homemaking services:

1. The services listed in paragraphs 1, 2, 5 to 10, 13 and 14 of subsection 2 (5) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994.

2. The services listed in paragraphs 11 and 12 of subsection 2 (5) of the Home Care and Community Services Act, 1994, but only in connection with the services listed in paragraphs 1, 2 and 5 to 10 of that subsection. O. Reg. 33/02, s. 2 (4); O. Reg. 115/10, s. 1 (4, 5).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 33/02, s. 3. TABLE Revoked: O. Reg. 553/06, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 33/02, s. 3.

TABLE Revoked: O. Reg. 553/06, s. 3.
